sentences.en: A few horse-drawn carts still trundle through the dilapidated mining villages.
sentences.cn: 几架马车仍然在破落的矿村中曲折行进。

sentences.en: Around 1910 motorized carriages were beginning to replace horse-drawn cabs.
sentences.cn: 大约从1910年起，机动车开始取代马车。

sentences.en: Drawn in lane three, she had all her rivals in sight.
sentences.cn: 她抽到第三道，所有对手尽收眼底。

sentences.en: Her sallow skin was drawn tightly across the bones of her face.
sentences.cn: 她那蜡黄的皮肤紧紧地包着脸上的骨头。

sentences.en: Interesting distinctions can be drawn between the two populations.
sentences.cn: 比较两类人可以发现有趣的差异。

sentences.en: Mother was lying on her bed, with the blinds drawn.
sentences.cn: 母亲正躺在床上，百叶窗已经拉了下来。

sentences.en: Pulling out of a recession is a lengthy and drawn-out process.
sentences.cn: 从经济衰退中走出来需要漫长的过程。

sentences.en: Several conclusions could be drawn from the results described above.
sentences.cn: 从上文描述的结果中可以得出几个结论。

sentences.en: That ruling had drawn sharp criticism from civil rights groups.
sentences.cn: 那项判决已遭到了民权组织的严厉批评。

sentences.en: The ambassador would not be drawn on questions of a political nature.
sentences.cn: 大使不会对政治问题发表意见。

sentences.en: The curtains were half drawn to cut out the sunlight.
sentences.cn: 窗帘拉上了一半以遮挡阳光。

sentences.en: The fluid can be drawn off with a syringe.
sentences.cn: 可用注射器将液体汲出。

sentences.en: The money was payable by a draft drawn by the home.
sentences.cn: 这笔钱可凭国内承兑的汇票支付。

sentences.en: The road to peace will be long and drawn-out.
sentences.cn: 通往和平的道路将很漫长。

sentences.en: This morning, looking harassed and drawn, Lewis tendered his resignation.
sentences.cn: 今天早晨，刘易斯面色憔悴、疲惫不堪地递交了辞呈。

phrases.tran_cn: v. 以（某人）为付款人；硬背装订
vt. 聚集（团结起来，一致）
出票依据；出票条款；在…开立
拉制线材；牵引线；冷拉钢丝

trans.tran_cn: 疲惫的，憔悴的，互无胜负的，拔出鞘的
trans.tran_en: someone who looks drawn has a thin pale face, because they are ill, tired or worried

trans.tran_cn: 绘画( draw的过去分词)，拖，拉，拔出
